Class AddItemController.IngredientItem

java.lang.Object
com.example.bobapos.controllers.AddItemController.IngredientItem
Enclosing class:
AddItemController
public static class AddItemController.IngredientItem extends Object
Represents a pairing of an inventory ingredient name and a required quantity for a menu item. This class is used as the row model for the ingredients table in the add-item modal.
